channel.title: Non-attacking npc
channel.description:
how can i make it were a certain npc will not attack me??? i have put one in a cage and i would like to be able to range it with out it attacking back.
See pic for more info
and the black squares are to keep leaches from taking my client pics(happened to me before)
IF YOU HELP ME I WILL REP YOU WHEN I CAN (2 REP AWAY)

item.title: Non-attacking npc
item.dc:creator: @ZeroPulse ZeroPulse
item.description:
@ZeroPulse wrote:

Ill give you a clue because i want you to learn, not fail.

                                       if (npcs[i].npcType == 81) {
						ResetAttackPlayer(NPCID);
                                                } else {
                                                AttackPlayer(i);
                                                }

Read full topic
